doc.title: The Yankee Girl
doc.plot: There is no reliable documentation that any film bearing this title was ever produced by Pathé at this or any other time. On the alleged release date, Pathé released two other films, but this title is nowhere in evidence. Once again the dubious pen of Richard E. Braff, in his notoriously error-prone Silent Short Film Working Papers, muddies film history with another bogus title.
